text: Mirjapur is a village in Sarlahi District in the Janakpur Zone of south- eastern Nepal. At the time of the 1991 Nepal census it had a population of 2,631 in 464 individual households.. ==References== ==External links== *UN map of the municipalities of Sarlahi District Category:Populated places in Sarlahi District
title: Mirjapur, Sarlahi
